Description.0: Đề thi môn Nhập môn công nghệ phần mềm

Question.3: Choose the correct option in terms of issues related to professional responsibility
Question.4: “Software engineers should not use their technical skills to misuse other people’s computers.”Here the term misuse refers to:
Question.5: Explain what is meant by PRODUCT with reference to one of the eight principles as per the ACM/IEEE Code of Ethics ?

Dap_An.6: Dissemination of viruses or other malware
Dap_An.8: The product should be easy to use
Dap_An.9: Software engineers shall ensure that their products and related modifications meet the highest professional standards possible
Dap_An.10: Software engineers shall ensure that their products and related modifications satisfy the client
Dap_An.11: It means that the product designed /created should be easily available

Subject_Name.0: Nhập môn công nghệ phần mềm

Description.0: Basically, the idea behind Software Engineering is to let you understand real world problems in Software Industry, so that when you encounter such problems - you have best solutions in hand and you don’t have to re-invent the wheel everytime.
